details.title: make the modal larger and on rhs (desktop) and below (mobile) show activity log - what should be tracked is any actions by bot and actions by user

we should have the ability to add multiple skills when editing a task card, also should be able to @skills (with nice autosuggest dropdown inside the quick add card input boxes, also remove the schedule part for now

drag and dropping tasks is a inaccurate, drop area doesnt seem to match the ui columns, and when dropping tasks below the task already in the column it should land below that task, rather than on top of the column and messing up the order
